pages.text: Thumma Yatubu Allahu Min Ba`di Dhalika `Ala Man Yasha'u Wa Allahu Ghafurun Rahimun

Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Innama Al-Mushrikuna Najasun Fala Yaqrabu Al-Masjida Al-Harama Ba`da `Amihim Hadha Wa 'In Khiftum `Aylatan Fasawfa Yughnikumu Allahu Min Fađlihi 'In Sha'a 'Inna Allaha `Alimun Hakimun

Qatilu Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Billahi Wa La Bil-Yawmi Al-'Akhiri Wa La Yuharrimuna Ma Harrama Allahu Wa Rasuluhu Wa La Yadinuna Dina Al-Haqqi Mina Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-Kitaba Hatta Yu`tu Al-Jizyata `An Yadin Wa Hum Saghiruna
Wa Qalati Al-Yahudu `Uzayrun Abnu Allahi Wa Qalati An-Nasara Al-Masihu Abnu Allahi Dhalika Qawluhum Bi'afwahihim Yuđahi'una Qawla Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min Qablu Qatalahumu Allahu 'Anna Yu'ufakuna
Attakhadhu 'Ahbarahum Wa Ruhbanahum 'Arbabaan Min Duni Allahi Wa Al-Masiha Abna Maryama Wa Ma 'Umiru 'Illa Liya`budu 'Ilahaan Wahidaan La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Subhanahu `Amma Yushrikuna
